Description.Text: The Hampton Inn NY-JFK Hotel is a superior, first class hotel featuring 216 elegantly styled guest rooms equipped with all the modern amenities needed by today's business and leisure traveler. Hampton Inn, located in Jamaica New York, is ¼ mile from JFK International Airport and just eight miles from La Guardia. The Hampton Inn New York provides complimentary shuttle service to and from JFK Airport. New York Hampton Inn provides the convenience, comfort and service to make any business or leisure trip to New York, pure pleasure. The hotel lobby has a warm, inviting fireplace in a library setting, which is the perfect place for our hotel guests to relax.

• New York - 15 miles • Belmont Racetrack - 5 miles • Yankee Stadium - 15 miles • Aqueduct Racetrack - 1 1/2 miles • Shea Stadium - 7 miles • Roosevelt Field Mall - 12 miles • Green Acres Mall - 8 miles • Lido Beach Golf Club - 9 miles • Arthur Ashe Stadium - 8 miles • Brooklyn Botanical Garden - 5 miles • Brooklyn Museum of Art - 5 miles • Queens Museum of Art - 4 miles • Nassau Veterans Memorial Coliseum - 12 miles • Coney Island - 6 miles • Jones Beach - 10 miles • St. John's University - 8 miles • St. John's University - Redstorm - 8 miles

The Hampton Inn JFK Airport features 216 spacious guestrooms featuring King or Double Queen beds, oversized desks with ergonomic chair, two-line telephone with data ports/fax capability, wireless internet, cable tv with Free HBO, in-room pay movies/games and free local phone calls.

In addition to a complimentary airport shuttle and room service during limited hours, Hampton Inn JFK Airport features laundry facilities and multilingual staff. Business amenities include wireless Internet access and audio-visual equipment. A hot and cold buffet breakfast is complimentary to guests. Guest parking is complimentary. The staff can arrange dry cleaning/laundry services. Additional amenities include a fireplace in the lobby, coffee in the lobby, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. The front desk is open 24 hours a day.

From Manhattan: Take the Queens Midtown Tunnel to the Long Island Expressway East. Exit the L.I.E. at the Grand Central Pkwy. East. Take the Grand Central Pkwy. to the Can Wyck Exp. South. Take the Van Wyuck to Exit #2, Rockaway Blvd. Make a left at the light onto the Rockaway Blvd. and take to 143rd St. (approximately 5 blocks). Make a right turn on 143rd St. and go to the end of the street. You will see the hotel to the left of you. From Brooklyn: Take the Belt Pkwy. East to Exit #20 and follow the sign for 150th St. Left on 150th St. over the bridge to North Conduit. Left on N. Conduit and stay in the extreme right lane which will curve off to 135th Ave. Follow this street to the hotel which will be on your left, approximately 200 yds.

Restaurants Nearby (Next Door): • Claudine's Restaurant (serves Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner 6:00am - 10:00pm) • LeBistro Cafe/Bar (serves Lunch and Dinner 11:30am - 1:00am) • Apres Lounge (serves beverages and snacks 11:30am - 1:00am)

This hotel was designed with the comfort of the guest's in mind. Conveniently located close to area attractions such as Aqueduct Race Track, Lido Beach Golf Club, St. Johns University and Green Acres Mall.
